articles.author: Doug Robinson
articles.title: BYU grad Courtney Wayment advances to the steeplechase finals at the USA track championships - Deseret News
articles.description: BYU grad Courtney Wayment advanced through the first round of the 3,000-meter steeplechase at the USA Track and Field Outdoor Championships
articles.content:
BYU grad Courtney Wayment breezed through the first round of the 3,000-meter steeplechase Friday to qualify for Sundays final in the USA Track and Field Outdoor Championships.
